summary: Successfully tested and fixed PDF download feature in College Result Portal. Fixed jspdf-autotable import issue that was causing JavaScript errors. All core functionality including admin login, student result management, and new PDF download feature working perfectly.
passed_tests: Backend API health check and all endpoints (8/8 tests passed)
Admin login flow with admin/12345 credentials (OTP skipped as expected)
Student result saving and retrieval functionality
PDF download button appears when results are displayed
PDF download button click triggers successful PDF generation
Pass/Fail logic validation in both UI and PDF (O, A+, A, B+, B, C = Pass, others = Fail)
Error handling for non-existent students shows 'No result found'
Complete flow: Login as admin → Save test student → View student result → Download PDF
Navigation between landing page, admin panel, and student result pages
PDF generation includes proper college header, student details, and formatted results table
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (8/8 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI flows and PDF download working)
